title: Looking for a good thresh to duo with

embed.description: SaNeGoRaS / Gold 3 48LP / 34W 27L Win Ratio 56% / Draven - 20W 4L Win Ratio 83%, Tryndamere - 3W 4L Win Ratio 43%, Darius - 3W 2L Win Ratio 60%, Nunu - 1W 4L Win Ratio 20%, Nasus - 1W 3L Win Ratio 25%

body: In gold got an 83 percent win rate on draven looking for a thresh who can keep up with my aggression.

replies.body:
damn nice stuff with Draven i just so happen to pretty much be a  "thresh only" if i ever get support (i don't mind supporting if know my adc isn't going to be ass)

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=rna

Winrate pretty shit (got stuck with a bunch of pretty bad adc's) 4.9 KDA through 39 and also was a 60% winrate thresh through 63 games in S5 with a 4.7 KDA

aside from the stats i'd say i'm above average
edit: not trying to sound full of myself or something but i really shouldn't be ranked g5 i could easily get to high gold maybe low plat if i had the max effort
